institution: Copenhagen School of Technology and Design
name: Web Development
description: A technical and project-driven program focused on developing advanced web applications with modern technologies and best practices. The education builds on multimediadesign foundations and emphasizes full-stack development, API design, database architecture, and scalable frontend solutions. I gained practical experience with technologies like JavaScript, Python, PHP, SQL/NoSQL databases, RESTful APIs, and DevOps workflows. The program also covered software architecture, testing, deployment, and agile collaboration in development teams.

institution: Copenhagen School of Technology and Design
name: Multimediadesign
description: A practice-oriented, interdisciplinary program focusing on digital design, user experience, and web development. Through hands-on projects and collaboration, I developed strong skills in UX/UI design, frontend development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript), digital strategy, content creation, and multimedia production. The program also included business understanding, project management, and a practical internship to bridge the gap between design, technology, and user needs.
